| History                 = The Kubekult was an extremist Neo-[[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] group who wanted to free [[Adolf Hitler (Earth-616)|Adolf Hitler]]'s [[Hate-Monger (Earth-616)|consciousness]] which has been trapped inside the [[Cosmic Cube]] by the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]].{{r|Captain America #445|446}}

They wanted to create a Fourth Reich called the ''New World Reich'', using the [[Cosmic Cube]] to warp reality, like changing the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|United States Army]] into the New World Reich Army.{{r|Captain America #447}}

Later, the Red Skull allied with [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and [[Sharon Carter (Earth-616)|Sharon Carter]] to defeat the Kubekult,{{r|Captain America ##445|447}} while secretly wanting the Cosmic Cube for himself to warp reality under his personal Nazi vision.{{r|Captain America #447}} The Skull successfully trapped Captain America inside the Cube, but he broke free and defeated the Skull.{{r|Captain America #448}}

Kubekult members were arrested by the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|United States Army]] after reality was restored back to its normal conditions due to the Cube being destroyed.{{r|Captain America #448}}
